price: This is only a small army[8] among several armies[9] that will soon be defeated.
arabic: جُندٞ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهۡزُومٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ
footnotes:
[8] It alludes to the defeat of the pagans of Makkah at Badr.
 [9] i.e., the defeated armies of the past who rejected their messengers.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
